title: Unexpected behavior with 'Copy Package'
description: Encountered unexpected behavior when using the 'Copy Package' functionality in version 2031 of org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui within jdt.ui3. Selecting xxx as the destination led to unusual results.
OB: Upon completion, the package 'ui' appears within xx unexpectedly.
EB: The 'Copy Package' operation should duplicate the selected package into the specified destination without creating unexpected or additional packages.
SR:
To replicate the issue:
1. Create a new project xxx.
2. Open the Package viewer.
3. Select a package within project A.
4. From the context menu, choose 'Copy'.
